Rulings.Edison:
● If you target an Attack Position monster, it is flipped into face-down Attack Position.
● You can Flip Summon a Set Attack Position monster into Attack Position.
● If a Set Attack Position monster is attacked, it is flipped into Attack Position.
● A Set Attack Position monster can't attack.
Rulings.Tengu:
● If you target an Attack Position monster, it is flipped into face-down Attack Position.
● You can Flip Summon a Set Attack Position monster into face-up Attack Position.
● If a Set Attack Position monster is attacked, it is flipped into face-up Attack Position.
● A Set Attack Position monster cannot attack.

Rulings.Cat:
● If you select an Attack Position monster, it is flipped into face-down Attack Position.
● You can Flip Summon the face-down Attack Position monster into Attack Position.
● When a face-down Attack Position monster is attacked, it is flipped into Attack Position.

● When a face-down Attack Position monster is attacked, it is flipped into Attack Position.

Rulings.Base: 1. If you select an Attack Position monster, it is flipped into face-down Attack Position.\n2. You can Flip Summon the face-down Attack Position monster into face-up Attack Position.\n3. When a face-down Attack Position monster is attacked, it is flipped into face-up Attack Position.

PSCT.Edison: ① Discard 2 cards, then target 1 face-up monster; Set it (but don’t change its Battle Position).
PSCT.Tengu:
① Discard 2 cards, then target 1 face-up monster;
Set it (but don’t change its Battle Position).
